Detailed Description

Class holding a memory regions storing the raw representation of a DataPacket.

RawMem can holds a memory region, containing a complete DataPacket. It does not care, whether there are more signal types in it or not. The needed memory size is automaticaly determined.

Constructor.

Parameters:
[in] flags Flags representing the content of the DataPacket.
[in] sample_nr The running sample number.
[in] packet_nr The running packet number (can be different to sample_nr).
[in] nr_values Number of values stored for every signal type in flags.
[in] nr_blocks Blocksize for every signal type in flags.
[in] data The samples to be stored.

Frees the memory region holding the DataPacket.
